import { Meta, ColorPalette, ColorItem  } from '@storybook/blocks';
import colorsRaw from '../../sass/variables/_colors.scss?raw';

export const colorsList = colorsRaw
    .split('\n')
    .filter(str => str.length)
    .map(color => {
        const [name, value] = color.split(':');

        return {
            name: name.trim(),
            value: value.trim().replace(';', ''),
            title: name.trim().replace('$', '').replaceAll('-', ' '),
        };
    });

export const RightArrow = () => <svg
    viewBox="0 0 14 14"
    width="8px"
    height="14px"
    style={{
      marginLeft: '4px',
      display: 'inline-block',
      shapeRendering: 'inherit',
      verticalAlign: 'middle',
      fill: 'currentColor',
      'path fill': 'currentColor'
    }}
>
  <path d="m11.1 7.35-5.5 5.5a.5.5 0 0 1-.7-.7L10.04 7 4.9 1.85a.5.5 0 1 1 .7-.7l5.5 5.5c.2.2.2.5 0 .7Z" />
</svg>

<Meta title="Styling/Colors" />

<div className="sb-container">
  <div className='sb-section-title'>
    # Colors

    <ColorPalette>
        {colorsList.map(color => {
            return (
                <ColorItem title={color.title} subtitle={color.name} colors={[color.value]} />
            );
        })}
    </ColorPalette>
  </div>
</div>
